statements: SELECT * FROM sim_card_data;
SELECT sim_card_id, data_plan FROM sim_card_data WHERE data_usage > 10;
SELECT mobile_number, data_plan FROM sim_card_data WHERE data_usage < 5 ORDER BY mobile_number ASC;
SELECT * FROM sim_card_data WHERE mobile_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT AVG(data_usage) AS average_data_usage FROM sim_card_data GROUP BY data_plan;
SELECT * FROM sim_card_data WHERE data_usage > 100 ORDER BY sim_card_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT sim_card_id, mobile_number FROM sim_card_data WHERE data_plan = 'Unlimited' AND data_usage < 50
SELECT * FROM sim_card_data WHERE mobile_number LIKE '555%' ORDER BY data_usage ASC
SELECT sim_card_id, data_usage FROM sim_card_data WHERE data_plan = '2GB' ORDER BY data_usage DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT sim_card_id, data_plan FROM sim_card_data WHERE sim_card_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200
SELECT * FROM SIM_Cards;
SELECT phone_number, country_code FROM SIM_Cards WHERE data_plan_id = 1;
SELECT sim_id, phone_number, country_code FROM SIM_Cards WHERE country_code = 'US' ORDER BY sim_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Data_Plans WHERE price <= 30.00 ORDER BY data_limit DESC;
SELECT sim_id, plan_name, data_limit, price FROM SIM_Cards JOIN Data_Plans ON SIM_Cards.data_plan_id = Data_Plans.data_plan_id ORDER BY sim_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM SIM_Cards WHERE country_code = 'US' AND data_plan_id = 1;
SELECT phone_number, country_code FROM SIM_Cards WHERE data_plan_id IN (3, 5) ORDER BY phone_number ASC;

SELECT SIM_Cards.sim_id, SIM_Cards.phone_number, Data_Plans.plan_name FROM SIM_Cards LEFT JOIN Data_Plans ON SIM_Cards.data_plan_id = Data_Plans.data_plan_id WHERE Data_Plans.price > 50 ORDER BY SIM_Cards.sim_id DESC;
SELECT MAX(data_limit) AS max_data_limit, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM Data_Plans;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_sim_cards FROM SIM_Cards WHERE country_code <> 'CA';
SELECT * FROM sim_cards;
SELECT phone_number, country_code, data_limit FROM sim_cards WHERE sim_id = 1;

SELECT sim_cards.sim_id, data_plans.plan_name, data_plans.price FROM sim_cards JOIN sim_card_data_plans ON sim_cards.sim_id = sim_card_data_plans.sim_id JOIN data_plans ON sim_card_data_plans.plan_id = data_plans.plan_id;
SELECT * FROM data_plans WHERE data_amount > 500;
SELECT sim_id, plan_id FROM sim_card_data_plans ORDER BY sim_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM sim_cards
SELECT sim_id, phone_number, country_code FROM sim_cards WHERE data_limit > 0
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sim_cards
SELECT plan_name, data_amount, price FROM data_plans WHERE data_amount > 500

SELECT sim_cards.phone_number, data_plans.plan_name FROM sim_cards JOIN sim_card_data_plans ON sim_cards.sim_id = sim_card_data_plans.sim_id JOIN data_plans ON sim_card_data_plans.plan_id = data_plans.plan_id
SELECT * FROM sim_cards;
SELECT phone_number, country_code FROM sim_cards WHERE country_code = 'US';
SELECT traveler_name, country_code FROM sim_cards WHERE country_code <> 'US' ORDER BY traveler_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM data_plans WHERE price < 50.00 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT plan_name, data_limit, price FROM data_plans WHERE data_limit >= 10 ORDER BY plan_name;
SELECT * FROM sim_cards WHERE country_code = 'US';
SELECT phone_number, traveler_name FROM sim_cards WHERE id = 1;
SELECT sim_id, SUM(data_usage) AS total_data_used FROM sim_usage GROUP BY sim_id;
SELECT plan_name, data_limit, price FROM data_plans WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT su.usage_id, pu.plan_id, su.date_used, pu.data_used FROM sim_usage su JOIN plan_usage pu ON su.usage_id = pu.usage_id;
SELECT * FROM sim_cards;
SELECT phone_number, data_balance FROM sim_cards WHERE country_code='US';
SELECT * FROM data_plans ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT plan_name FROM data_plans;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, s.phone_number FROM transaction_history t JOIN sim_cards s ON t.sim_id = s.sim_id;
SELECT * FROM sim_cards ORDER BY data_balance DESC;
SELECT phone_number, country_code FROM sim_cards WHERE country_code = 'US';
SELECT sim_id, phone_number, data_balance FROM sim_cards WHERE data_balance > 1000;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users JOIN sim_ownership ON users.user_id = sim_ownership.user_id;
SELECT sim_id, transaction_date, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 50 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
